system.description: When you blackmail a powerful NPC with proof of their dirty deeds, roll with your Status in their Circle.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, they call your bluff and make you, or your source, pay.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value:
On a hit, hold 2.

Spend your hold—1 for 1—as if spending a Debt (asking for a moderate favor, adding +3 to your roll when @UUID[Compendium.urban-shadows-pbta.play-materials.Item.Jt8eL0qM4rN7sO3p]{persuading} them, etc.) when interacting with your target. Once you’ve used the last of your hold, take -1 ongoing to moves targeting them until time passes.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value:
On a 10+ hold 3.

Spend your hold—1 for 1—as if spending a Debt (asking for a moderate favor, adding +3 to your roll when persuading them, etc.) when interacting with your target. Once you’ve used the last of your hold, take -1 ongoing to moves targeting them until time passes.
